pr_title: DBZ-1944 moving files that are used only in includes to partials

timeline.message:
DBZ-1944 moving files that are used only in includes to partials

... so that Antora doesn't create a separate page for them that would be meaningless or confusing to users or search engines

timeline.bodyText: Where is partialsdir defined? Does it exist implicitly?
timeline.author: gunnarmorling

replies.bodyText:
It is one of the attributes Antora provides implicitly. An Antora aware editor would provide it as well.
It is also set in _attributes.adoc for non-Antora environments, supposedly downstream. As include supports absolute file names, it might be an option for a non-Antora (downstream) environment to pass this at build time as an absolute path.
Using relative paths is probably messy. / cc: @bhardesty
replies.author: ahus1

replies.bodyText: Ok, gotcha. Thanks a lot for clarifying!
replies.author: gunnarmorling
